citances.sentence: 8 It is unnecessary to set out again the factual and procedural history which is set out in the reasons for judgment published on 1 May 2006 --- Applicant S1140/2003 v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2006] FCA 526. These reasons, should be read together with those, for that purpose.
